thread.title: Democrat says Trump raises question of impeachment
thread.title_full: Democrat says Trump raises question of impeachment

title: Democrat says Trump raises question of impeachment
text: Leading contender in Democratic chairman race says Donald Trump 'legitimately raises the question of impeachment' despite being PRAISED by the president for predicting his election win Keith Ellison said the president had done 'a number of things' which may warrant impeachment The only one he listed was 'monetizing from the presidency' by allowing 'foreign dignitaries' to stay at Trump hotels while he was in office He claimed it breaches constitutional laws preventing the president accepting money from foreign powers Ellison, the Muslim representative for Minnesota, is vying for the Democratic leadership He made the comments at a debate chaired by CNN in Atlanta on Wednesday Hours earlier Trump praised him on Twitter for predicting his election win in 2015 Published: 05:54 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 07:00 GMT, 23 February 2017 15 shares
